div.p: To create an expression specifically requesting information that a procedure intentionally did not occur for a medical, patient or system reason, use the profile QICore-Procedurenotdone.

pre.code: define "Flexible Sigmoidoscopy Performed": [Procedure: "Flexible Sigmoidoscopy"] FlexibleSigmoidoscopy where FlexibleSigmoidoscopy.status = 'completed' and Global."Normalize Interval"(FlexibleSigmoidoscopy.performed) ends 5 years or less on or before end of "Measurement Period"
